attributes.background: The coalition government raised tuition fees to £9000. Should we really have to pay money so we can learn more? No! Because it puts young adults in debt for the rest of their lives and prevents many young adults from poorer backgrounds being able to get degrees. Let's make education free!

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104787

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
